body:
Unclear when Python 3 support was added, but the [installation guide](https://confluence.ecmwf.int/display/MAGP/Installation+Guide) says Python 2.7 and 3.X are both supported. Also, as of Magics 4.0.0, the Python library is now a separate package: https://confluence.ecmwf.int//display/MAGP/Magics

This PR has not been tested in any way.
title: Add Magics 4.1.0
